articles.title: Coral Reef Restoration in the Caribbean: A Decade of Progress
articles.authors: Smith, J.M., Rodriguez, A.C., Thompson, K.L.
articles.abstract: This study examines coral reef restoration efforts across the Caribbean region over the past decade.

articles.title: Unusual 2025 interactions of Iberian Orcinus orca with sailing vessels: behaviour patterns and conservation responses

articles.abstract: Documentation of unusual orca interactions with sailing vessels in Iberian waters during 2025.
